mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO oms_order_operate_history (order_id, operate_man, create_time, order_status, note) VALUES
(#{item.orderId}, #{item.operateMan}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.orderStatus}, #{item.note})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into oms_order_operate_history (order_id, operate_man, create_time, order_status, note) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operateMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
